title: Ex-Trump Aide Flynn Wants to Withdraw Guilty Plea
itunes:title: Ex-Trump Aide Flynn Wants to Withdraw Guilty Plea
description:
Andrew Harris, Bloomberg Legal Reporter, discusses former national security adviser Michael Flynn’s attempt to withdraw his guilty plea to the charge he lied to federal agents, accusing prosecutors of bad faith and vindictive conduct. He speaks to host June Grasso.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
